question_stem.en: A 12-year-old boy is brought to the office by his mother due to headaches and gait instability. The headaches wake the patient and are associated with nausea and vomiting. Symptoms began several months ago and have progressively worsened. The patient has lost 2.7 kg (6 lb) since his last well visit 6 months ago. On physical examination, gait is unsteady, and there is dysmetria on finger-to-nose testing. MRI of the brain is shown in the image below. {{exhibit_1}}
question_stem.zh: 一名12岁男孩由其母亲带到诊所，因为头痛和步态不稳。头痛会唤醒患者，并伴有恶心和呕吐。症状始于几个月前，并逐渐恶化。自上次6个月前的健康检查以来，患者已减轻2.7公斤（6磅）。体格检查显示，步态不稳，指鼻试验有辨距不良。脑部MRI如下图所示。{{exhibit_1}}

question.en: Which of the following is the most likely diagnosis?
question.zh: 以下哪项是最可能的诊断？

summary.en:
This question tests the ability to diagnose common pediatric brain tumors based on clinical presentation and imaging findings. It specifically assesses knowledge of the characteristics and typical locations of pilocytic astrocytoma, ependymoma, glioblastoma, medulloblastoma, and oligodendroglioma in children.

To solve this question, one should correlate the patient's age, symptoms (headaches, nausea, vomiting, gait instability, dysmetria), and MRI findings (mixed solid/cystic cerebellar mass) with the known epidemiology and imaging features of various pediatric brain tumors. Differentiating between cystic and solid components, location, and degree of enhancement is crucial.
summary.zh:
这个问题考察了根据临床表现和影像学发现诊断常见儿童脑肿瘤的能力。它专门评估了对儿童毛细胞型星形细胞瘤、室管膜瘤、胶质母细胞瘤、髓母细胞瘤和少突胶质细胞瘤的特征和典型位置的了解。

要解决这个问题，应该将患者的年龄、症状（头痛、恶心、呕吐、步态不稳、辨距不良）和MRI发现（混合实性/囊性小脑肿块）与各种儿童脑肿瘤的已知流行病学和影像学特征相关联。区分囊性和实性成分、位置和增强程度至关重要。
